channel.title: Neoscape
channel.description:
This section is for the development of a 508-compliant runescape emulator. If you can see this then you have been chosen by both myself and Yz85Racer to play a part in this.
The project has several goals:
[ul][li]The development of a 508 compliant server.[/li] [li]The development of a login server for aforementioned 508 server, which will allow things such as global banning, private messages from server to server, and so on.[/li] [li]To expose the people that have the ability to view this section to a proper project that will hopefully succeed.[/li] [li]To allow people that have the ability to view this section to contribute by way of code and/or design ideas.[/li] [li]To allow people that have the ability to view this section to ask higher level questions.[/li][/ul]
This section is not publicly viewable, as you may have guessed. That said, my only request is that you don't make the existance of this section public knowledge.
[size=12pt]Development Information[/size] [url=http://www.assembla.com/spaces/neoscape]Assembla space[/url] [url=http://trac.assembla.com/neoscape/browser]Online Code Browsing[/url] [url=http://www.cs.ubc.ca/~vailen/svn_howto.htm]SVN Tutorial[/url]
[size=12pt]Resources[/size] [url=http://tortoisesvn.net/downloads]TortoiseSVN[/url] - a SVN client for windows users that is automatically integrated into windows explorer. [url=http://www.MegaShare.com/544750]Effective Java 2nd Edition by Josh Bloch[/url]
[size=12pt]Current Members[/size]
[ul][li]Yz85Racer[/li] [li]Lothy[/li] [li]Scarecrows[/li] [li]Benz[/li] [li]ZeroFreeze[/li] [li]_Vengeance[/li][/ul]

item.title: Neoscape
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Yz85Racer:

Looks as if this project is outstandingly brilliant. We have made so much progress. Keep it up boys.

Yeah, we will. <3

item.title: Neoscape

item.description:
@lothy wrote:

This section is for the development of a 508-compliant runescape emulator. If you can see this then you have been chosen by both myself and Yz85Racer to play a part in this.

The project has several goals:

[ul][li]The development of a 508 compliant server.[/li]
[li]The development of a login server for aforementioned 508 server, which will allow things such as global banning, private messages from server to server, and so on.[/li]
[li]To expose the people that have the ability to view this section to a proper project that will hopefully succeed.[/li]
[li]To allow people that have the ability to view this section to contribute by way of code and/or design ideas.[/li]
[li]To allow people that have the ability to view this section to ask higher level questions.[/li][/ul]

This section is not publicly viewable, as you may have guessed. That said, my only request is that you don’t make the existance of this section public knowledge.
